Context:
The library at George Brown College has made changes to their LLC Laptop Loan Policy on December 18, 2023. You can request to have library books put on hold and will be notified when they become available. However, you cannot place holds on tech equipment, reserve items, journals, magazines, videos, or DVDs. To place a hold, you must be logged into your library account. Items will be held at the Circulation/Help Desk at the chosen campus for pick-up for 7 days once they're ready. Notifications of pick-up will be sent to your GBC email account.

Contact information:
- Phone number: 416-415-2000, TTY: 1-877-515-5559
- Email address: ask.george@georgebrown.ca

Additional services and information:
- Land acknowledgment information is available for learning
- Sign up for updates on application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, etc.

Website note: The information in the website is subject to change without notice. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
